message.content:
{"id": "9654", "title": "Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details", "description": "Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - The dialog details have the following issues: 

- The name validation is duplicated on the first page.
- The first and second columns should be merged.
- The buttons are too small.
- When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected, but both move buttons are enabled.
- When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
- The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.", 
"OB": "a. The buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.",
"EB": "a. The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top.
b. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.
c. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up/down can be applied on more than one item.
d. The signature preview must be a label that wraps.
e. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.",
"SR": ""}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

It would be nice if the signature preview has the backaground color set tothe same color as a hoverh. ', 'SR': ''}
